data_table.description: EDIC. Diabetic neuropathy of participants with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: EOB1
variable.description: B1. Neurological history: are your legs and/or feet numb?

variable.name: EOB2
variable.description: B2. Neurological history: ever have any burning pain in legs/feet

variable.name: EOB3
variable.description: B3. Neurological history: are your feet too sensitive to touch

variable.name: EOB4
variable.description: B4. Neurological history: get muscle cramps in your legs/feet

variable.name: EOB5
variable.description: B5. Neurological history: any prickling feelings in legs/feet

variable.name: EOB6
variable.description: B6. Neurological history: hurt when bed covers touch your skin

variable.name: EOB7
variable.description: B7. Neurological history: are you able to tell hot/cold water

variable.name: EOB8
variable.description: B8. Neurological history: ever had an open sore on your feet

variable.name: EOB9
variable.description: B9. Neurological history: ever had diabetic neuropathy

variable.name: EOB10
variable.description: B10. Neurological history: feel weak all over most of the time

variable.name: EOB11
variable.description: B11. Neurological history: are your symptoms worse at night

variable.name: EOB12
variable.description: B12. Neurological history: do your legs hurt when you walk

variable.name: EOB13
variable.description: B13. Neurological history: able to sense your feet when you walk

variable.name: EOB14
variable.description: B14. Neurological history: is skin on feet so dry it cracks open

variable.name: EOB15
variable.description: B15. Neurological history: have you ever had an amputation

variable.name: EOCAR
variable.description: C1a. Neuropathy screening instrument: appearance of feet (right) normal

variable.name: EOCAL
variable.description: C1a. Neuropathy screening instrument: appearance of feet (left) normal

variable.name: EOCB1R
variable.description: C1b. Neuropathy screening instrument: appearance of feet (right) deformities

variable.name: EOCB1L
variable.description: C1b. Neuropathy screening instrument: appearance of feet (left) deformities

variable.name: EOCB2R
variable.description: C1b. Neuropathy screening instrument: appearance of feet (right) dry skin, callus

variable.name: EOCB2L
variable.description: C1b. Neuropathy screening instrument: appearance of feet (left) dry skin, callus

variable.name: EOCB3R
variable.description: C1b. Neuropathy screening instrument: appearance of feet (right) infection

variable.name: EOCB3L
variable.description: C1b. Neuropathy screening instrument: appearance of feet (left) infection

variable.name: EOCB4R
variable.description: C1b. Neuropathy screening instrument: appearance of feet (right) fissure

variable.name: EOCB4L
variable.description: C1b. Neuropathy screening instrument: appearance of feet (left) fissure

variable.name: EOCB5R
variable.description: C1b. Neuropathy screening instrument: appearance of feet (right) other

variable.name: EOCB5L
variable.description: C1b. Neuropathy screening instrument: appearance of feet (left) other

variable.name: EOC2R
variable.description: C2. Neuropathy screening instrument: ulceration (right)

variable.name: EOC2L
variable.description: C2. Neuropathy screening instrument: ulceration (left)

variable.name: EOC3R
variable.description: C3. Neuropathy screening instrument: ankle reflexes (right)

variable.name: EOC3L
variable.description: C3. Neuropathy screening instrument: ankle reflexes (left)

variable.name: EOC4R
variable.description: C4. Neuropathy screening instrument: vibration perception at great toe (right)

variable.name: EOC4L
variable.description: C4. Neuropathy screening instrument: vibration perception at great toe (left)

variable.name: EOC5R
variable.description: C5. Neuropathy screening instrument: 10 gram filament (right)

variable.name: EOC5L
variable.description: C5. Neuropathy screening instrument: 10 gram filament (left)

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Deidentified form date

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. Deidentified patient ID
